languages.text: Напутствие Вольного Торговца подняло боевой дух арбитров. Да обрушится кара Лекс Империалис на еретиков!
The Rogue Trader's speech has bolstered the Arbitrators' morale. Let the wrath of the Lex Imperialis fall upon the heretics!
languages.original_text: Напутствие Вольного Торговца подняло боевой дух арбитров. Да обрушится кара Лекс Империалис на еретиков!

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's speech has bolstered the Arbitrators' morale. Let the wrath of the Lex Imperialis fall upon the heretics!

languages.text: 行商浪人的演讲鼓舞了全体法务官的士气。是时候将帝国法典的怒火倾泻在异端分子头上了！
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's speech has bolstered the Arbitrators' morale. Let the wrath of the Lex Imperialis fall upon the heretics!

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的演讲鼓舞了全体法务官的士气。是时候将帝国法典的怒火倾泻在异端分子头上了！

languages.text: ローグトレーダーの演説はアービトレイターたちの士気を高めた。レックス・インペリアの怒りよ、異端者たちに降りかかれ！
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's speech has bolstered the Arbitrators' morale. Let the wrath of the Lex Imperialis fall upon the heretics!

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの演説はアービトレイターたちの士気を高めた。レックス・インペリアの怒りよ、異端者たちに降りかかれ！

languages.text: Die Ansprache {rt_mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat die Moral der Arbitratoren gestärkt. Möge der Zorn des Lex Imperia über die Ketzer kommen!
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's speech has bolstered the Arbitrators' morale. Let the wrath of the Lex Imperialis fall upon the heretics!

traits.locale_text: Die Ansprache {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hat die Moral der Arbitratoren gestärkt. Möge der Zorn des Lex Imperia über die Ketzer kommen!

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in hitabesi, Yargıcılar'ın yüreğine sarsılmaz bir cesaret aşıladı. Lex İmperialis'in gazabı, kâfirlerin tepesine yıldırım gibi insin!
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's speech has bolstered the Arbitrators' morale. Let the wrath of the Lex Imperialis fall upon the heretics!

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in hitabesi, Yargıcılar'ın yüreğine sarsılmaz bir cesaret aşıladı. Lex İmperialis'in gazabı, kâfirlerin tepesine yıldırım gibi insin!

languages.text: El discurso de{rt_mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ha reforzado la moral de los Arbitrator. ¡Que la furia de la Lex Imperialis caiga sobre los herejes!
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's speech has bolstered the Arbitrators' morale. Let the wrath of the Lex Imperialis fall upon the heretics!

traits.locale_text: El discurso de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ha reforzado la moral de los Arbitrator. ¡Que la furia de la Lex Imperialis caiga sobre los herejes!

languages.text: Le discours {rt_mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a renforcé le moral des arbitrators. Que les foudres de la Lex Imperialis s'abattent sur les hérétiques !
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's speech has bolstered the Arbitrators' morale. Let the wrath of the Lex Imperialis fall upon the heretics!
